Package com.movie.store.controller

Class MovieController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.movie.store.controller.MovieController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping(value="api",
                produces="application/json")
public class MovieController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is rest controller for movies.

    • Method Detail

      • getMovies

        @GetMapping("movies")
public java.lang.Object getMovies​(@RequestParam(required=false)
                                  java.lang.String title)
        This method returns a movie with a specified title. If a title is not specified it will return all movies.
        Parameters:
        title - specifies the title of the movie customer wants to find (works with a part of a title).
        Returns:
        all movies or movies with specified title if title is specified. If the exception was caught, method returns exception message from service layer.

      • getMovieById

        @GetMapping("movies/{movieId}")
public java.lang.Object getMovieById​(@PathVariable("movieId")
                                     java.lang.Long movieId)
        This method returns movie available in the library by its ID.
        Parameters:
        movieId - specifies movie ID (required).
        Returns:
        movie with a specified ID. If the exception was caught, method returns exception message from service layer.

      • getCategoriesByMovieId

        @GetMapping("movies/{movieId}/categories")
public java.lang.Object getCategoriesByMovieId​(@PathVariable("movieId")
                                               java.lang.Long movieId)
        This method returns categories assigned to a movie with given ID.
        Parameters:
        movieId - specifies movie ID (required).
        Returns:
        categories assigned to a movie. If the exception was caught, method returns exception message from service layer.

      • addMovie

        @PostMapping("addmovie")
public java.lang.String addMovie​(@RequestBody
                                 Movie movie)
        This method adds a new movie to the database.
        Parameters:
        movie - is a movie object that is sent through request body (required).
        Returns:
        a message if a new movie is added. If the exception was caught, method returns exception message from service layer.

      • deleteMovie

        @DeleteMapping("deletemovie/{movieId}")
public java.lang.String deleteMovie​(@PathVariable("movieId")
                                    java.lang.Long movieId)
        This method deletes a movie from the database by its ID.
        Parameters:
        movieId - is movie ID (required).
        Returns:
        a message if a movie is deleted. If the exception was caught, method returns exception message from service layer.

      • manageMovie

        @PutMapping(path="managemovie/{movieId}")
public java.lang.String manageMovie​(@PathVariable("movieId")
                                    java.lang.Long movieId,
                                    @RequestParam(required=false)
                                    java.lang.String movieTitle,
                                    @RequestParam(required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE)
                                    java.time.LocalDate releaseDate,
                                    @RequestParam(required=false)
                                    java.lang.String actors,
                                    @RequestParam(required=false)
                                    java.lang.String description)
        This method updates a movie in the database.
        Parameters:
        movieId - ID of a movie that needs to be updated (required).
        movieTitle - is title of a movie.
        releaseDate - is a release date of a movie.
        actors - actors in the movie.
        description - is a description of the movie.
        Returns:
        a message if a movie was changed. If the exception was caught, method returns exception message from service layer.
